name: brogrammer-server
description: Brogrammer Server is E-learning App Server

scripts.createDBTest: clear && npx sequelize --env test db:drop && npx sequelize --env test db:create
scripts.migrateTest: clear && npx sequelize --env test db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize --env test db:migrate && npx sequelize --env test db:seed:all
scripts.createDB: clear && npx sequelize db:drop && npx sequelize db:create
scripts.migrate: clear && npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.all: npm run createDB && npm run migrate && npm run start

author: artharestu
